original: FLENSBURG, Mls Mathias, Grosshandlare, Malmö, f Gävle 79 av grhdl F F o h h f Zetterström, gm Astrid Petersen. Studex 97. Anst å köpm.kont å kontin o i Engl 97—08, etabl 08 Fma Nils M Flensburg (imp av oljor o oljefröer, spec rå v f margarin-, såp-, tvål-0 kem.tekn ind; repr eng, amerik o argentinska f mor; AB 20). Medl Sk handelskamm o Malmö Börsfrn. Ag fastigheten Ingelstadsgat 7. Resor: Årl t europ länd. Hobby: Ridning.
translated: FLENSBURG, Mls Mathias, Wholesale Merchant, Malmö, born Gävle 1879, son of the Wholesale Merchant F F and his wife Zetterström, married to Astrid Petersen. Graduated in 1897. Employed at commercial offices in continental Europe and England from 1897 to 1908, established Fma Nils M Flensburg in 1908 (importer of oils and oilseeds, specializing in raw materials for margarine, soap, detergent, and chemical-technical industries; representative of British, American, and Argentinean mother companies; AB 1920). Member of the Chamber of Commerce and Malmö Stock Exchange. Owns property at Ingelstadsgat 7. Travels annually to European countries. Hobbies: Horseback riding.
